title: Grand jury counsel; disqualification
context: ยง612-56 Grand jury counsel; disqualification. (a) Grand jury counsel shall disqualify oneself in any matter in which circumstances render substantial question upon the counsel&rsquo;s impartiality or which would jeopardize public confidence in the grand jury. (b) The prosecutor may petition the court for disqualification of the grand jury counsel for cause. Upon a hearing, the court shall issue an appropriate order permitting or denying such petition. [L 1980, c 209, ยง7; gen ch 1985]
